Description: Limestone ostracon with 7 lines of text on recto and on verso containing a letter.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Henri Édouard Naville (propably EEF, 1903-1907 ?)
Bibliographic references: Biedenkopf-Ziehner 2000a / Koptische Ostraka I: Ostraka aus dem Britischen Museum in London (207-210, pl.24)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (82889) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/82889)
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: O.Brit.Mus.Copt. II 23 (text edition abbreviation according to Oates et al 2001)
